Title: January 2015
Content: 23*p45044a02328*turn over      *(iii) an experiment was carried out to determine the value of kc for this reaction.   ɣ 0.120 mol of ethanoic acid was added to 0.220 mol of ethanol.   ɣ 5.00 cm3 of 1.00 mol dm–3 hydrochloric acid was added as a catalyst.  this contains 0.278 mol of water.   ɣ the mixture was left to reach equilibrium.   ɣ the mixture was titrated with 1.00 mol dm–3 sodium hydroxide, which reacted with both of the acids.   ɣ the titre was 45.0 cm3.   use these data to determine the value for kc.(6)
